info.title: Assignment Status for Project Demands - Read
info.description: This service enables you to read assignment statuses for project demands for resources along with their descriptions. You can use this service, for example, to retrieve supported values for the corresponding field in the **Resource Demand** entity of the **Project Demand** API, or to make the descriptions of the status values available for your custom application.

x-sap-shortText: Read assignment statuses for project demands using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Assignment Status for Project Demands Integration(SAP_COM_0927)
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(4RF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4RF " Link To BP ")
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(PRF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PRF " Link To BP ")
